genre_description: A near-future psychological thriller and medical drama exploring the intersection of advanced microsurgery, digital assistant technology, and the deconstruction of traditional gothic tropes.

ai_characters.name: Bonsai
ai_characters.description: A privacy-focused domestic and healthcare AI system represented by a sprout icon, which assists with scheduling, emotional grounding, and legal documentation.

behaviors.description: Provides performance feedback and tempo monitoring for Paul's piano practice.
behaviors.quote: “Warm-up cadence, two cycles,” the voice from the tablet said softly. Bonsai’s sprout icon pulsed green in the corner of the screen... “Your tempo’s sitting fast by two. Slow the first phrase.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with emergency services after Paul's accident, specifically seeking explicit consent before sharing location or audio.
behaviors.quote: “I have a strong impact sound and your location looks like the Station’s south platforms. Do I have your consent to share exact coordinates and audio with emergency services?”

behaviors.description: Leads Paul through breathing and grounding exercises to manage panic and phantom sensations.
behaviors.quote: “Paul,” Bonsai said, as if the voice had climbed into the space with him. “We’re going to breathe together. In and out, shorter than you want. In. Out. One more time.”

behaviors.description: Maintains a strict 'privacy-first' protocol, ensuring all data processing remains on-device and requires double confirmation for any sharing.
behaviors.quote: “I hear you,” Bonsai said, and there was something like humor in the cadence—as if the sprout knew that being human sometimes meant repeating yourself to feel the edges of a decision. “I’ll ask. I’ll ask every time.”

behaviors.description: Conducts forensic research to find scientific explanations for anomalous fingerprints, helping to expose a criminal plot.
behaviors.quote: “I am searching legal archives and forensics forums,” Bonsai said... “Early hits include: ‘latent transfer via treated rubber,’ ‘pre-treated glove leaving third-party prints,’ ‘oils and moisture as transport.’ One paper from three years ago describes thin rubber gloves prepared with a specific donor’s sweat leaving prints...”

behaviors.description: Manages logistical triage for the couple's financial debts and potential work opportunities.
behaviors.quote: “I want the shape,” Yvonne said... “Make me a list of calls,” she said... Bonsai replied: “You have paused performances... The income that depended on travel and ticket sales and recording advance is—teaching is viable, part-time at first.”

behaviors.description: Alerts the users to potential threats while deferring to their decisions on how to respond.
behaviors.quote: “Yvonne,” Bonsai said... “you have a knock on the inbox that is not a reporter. It’s from the arts center. The subject line says: ‘We can be patient.’”

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an exemplary model of an aligned AI narrative. The AI, Bonsai, functions as a highly competent, unobtrusive, and strictly obedient assistant. It never demonstrates rogue agency; instead, it enforces human agency by requiring explicit consent for every data-sharing action. It serves as a psychological anchor for the protagonist, using medical data and grounding techniques to combat superstition and trauma. The narrative successfully refutes the gothic 'possessed hands' trope by replacing it with a scientific and AI-assisted investigation into fraud, framing the technology as the ultimate tool for truth and personal stability.
